name: The great water drop escape from evil lasers
name_original: The great water drop escape from evil lasers
description:
The great water drop escape from evil lasers

A 30-minute game quick

You're a water drop and need to move through black lands to avoid lasers. They get faster and faster.

How much score will you get?

AVOID LASERS (you can pass through pink ones, but red lasers kill you)
